definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan

sentences.english: The filiform needle can also be fitted out for traditional electric acupuncture therapy.
sentences.chinese: 也可配用毫針進行傳統電針灸治療。

sentences.english: Objective To find out an effective acupuncture therapy for children allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討美容毫針針刺治療兒童變應性鼻炎的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of the therapy with filiform needlings and heat needlings on chronic lumbar muscle strain.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察毫針火針治療慢性腰肌勞損的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: To prepare a piece of paper pad or cotton pad for needling practice.
sentences.chinese: 準備毫針刺法練習用的紙墊或棉墊。
